EmailTemplate.description: 5 Point Mag Pub social post TEAM
EmailTemplate.name: Order Fulfillment Product Delivered - Social Post_5 Point TEAM
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Five Star Professional social post for Five Point magazine has been published!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}:
A new social post has been published for you! Please check out your new post online and share it directly to your network to optimize the views and interactions.
Your post can be viewed here: {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Additionally, we encourage you to share the following announcement email with your clients and network. Just copy/paste the content below into an email or other digital announcement platform to share.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to your Client Success Representative, {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Fullname__c}, at {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Phone__c} or by email at {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Email__c}.
Thank you, Five Star Professional Client Success Team Great News! Five Point magazine is out in the {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Market_Region__c} area! Five Point magazine is a guide to help you build a professional network in the {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Market_Region__c} area. Reach out to some of the award-winning professionals featured in this issue, including {!Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c}.
{!Order_Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c} can be found in Five Point magazine and also online on FiveStarProfessional.com. Click through to the social post here to learn more and share in their success! Jonathan Wesser Five Star Professional VP, Research
